channel.title: Problems logging in more than once per server restart
channel.description:
can anyone help me with this ive tried so many time to find you how to fix this problem ?
Basically you can only log in once per restart. once you log out when you try to log back in it says "no response from sercer" even though the server is online, its loosing me alot of players on my server. I had to put in a 1 hour auto restart which then causes some rolls back if players dont save game.

item.title: Problems logging in more than once per server restart
item.dc:creator: @rlmross rlmross
item.description:
@rlmross wrote:

Nope Insidia base I think

Read full topic
